# grantory_requests (Data Source)
Use this data source to filter Grantory records inside a Terraform/OpenTofu plan.

## Example
```terraform
data "grantory_requests" "operations" {
  labels = {
    team = "operations"
  }
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) Labels that each returned request must include.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `requests` (List of Object) Requests returned by Grantory. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--requests))

<a id="nestedatt--requests"></a>
### Nested Schema for `requests`

Read-Only:

- `has_grant` (Boolean)
- `host_id` (String)
- `request_id` (String)
